casebody.data:
Ronald P. GILLIS, Appellant,
v.
DEUTSCHE BANK TRUST COMPANY AMERICAS, as Trustee FOR RESIDENTIAL ACCREDIT LOANS, INC., MORTGAGE ASSET-BACKED PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-QS8 and SunTrust Bank, Appellees. Case No. 2D16-3887 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed March 2, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
